original: intros f g x y Hf Hg. unfold continuity_2d_pt. intros eps. unfold continuity_2d_pt in Hg. pose proof (Hg eps) as Hg_eps. unfold continuity_pt in Hf. unfold continue_in, no_cond in Hf. specialize (Hf eps). destruct Hg_eps as [de [He1 He2]]. destruct Hf as [df [Hf1 Hf2]]. exists (Rmin de df). split. - apply Rmin_pos; auto. - intros u v Hu Hv. specialize (He2 u v). specialize (Hf2 (g u v)). assert (H1 : Rabs (u - x) < de). { apply Rlt_trans with (Rmin de df); [assumption | apply Rmin_l]. } assert (H2 : Rabs (v - y) < de). { apply Rlt_trans with (Rmin de df); [assumption | apply Rmin_l]. } assert (H3 : Rabs (g u v - g x y) < eps). { apply He2; auto. } assert (H4 : Rabs (u - x) < df). { apply Rlt_trans with (Rmin de df); [assumption | apply Rmin_r]. } assert (H5 : f (g u v) = f (g x y)). { apply Hf2; auto. } rewrite H5 in H3. auto.
